Infer the sex of sample donor

check_sex.Rd

Return the normalized average total intensities of probes targeting the X and Y chromosomes.

check_sex(raw)

predict_sex(X, Y, male, female)

Arguments

raw

Output of calling read_idats
X, Y

Forwarded from check_sex
male, female

Indices of male and female samples

Value

check_sex returns the normalized average total intensities of probes targeting the X and Y chromosomes. These are forwarded to predict_sex which returns a factor with levels "f","m" (and NA if the sex cannot be determined conclusively).

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
